name: NoRoY
description:
NoRoY is a dark, unique, and extremely challenging experience, full of tension. You must climb to the top, but every mistake you make comes at a high price, as falling to the bottom can result in losing significant progress. NoRoY is a highly agile creature, and you have precise control over it. Each level is handcrafted, ensuring fairness and putting everything in the player's hands. However, the world is inhabited by disturbing creatures that relentlessly pursue you, with their behavior randomized, creating unique experiences.



•Full of tense moments
•Handcrafted levels
•Precise movement + control
•Very difficult experience that will test your skills
•New mechanics introduced as you climb higher
•Use bonfires to save your progress.
•Harsh mistakes cause you to lose your progress
•Face intense boss levels
•Original soundtrack
•Unique enemy behavior that makes each run feels different
•A world full of dark creatures
